mapper.delete: delete from community where communityId=#{communityId} and userId=#{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into community (category, title, content, userId, tonicId) values (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{tonicId});
mapper.select:
SELECT community.*, user.nick FROM community JOIN user ON community.userId = user.userId
order by communityId desc limit #{offset}, #{pageSize}

choose.when: INNER JOIN user ON community.userId = user.userId WHERE user.nick like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
choose.otherwise: where (title like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{keyword}, '%'))
